passives.name: Eternity
passives.effects: Restore {{as|mana}} equal to 10% of {{tt|pre-mitigation damage|Damage calculated before modifiers}} taken from champions, and {{tip|heal}} for an amount equal to {{as|25% of mana spent}}, up to 20 per cast. Toggled abilities can only heal for up to 20 per second.

effects_structured.raw: Restore mana equal to 10% of pre-mitigation damage taken from champions.
Heal for 25% of mana spent, up to 20 per cast (toggles: 20 per second).

schema_notes.effects_structured: Parsed from passive/active text for simulation use.
schema_notes.effects_structured_reviewed: Manual review: Eternity mana restore + heal with caps.
